SEARCH
Module hanyaeger
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities

Class EntitySpawner

java.lang.Object
com.github.hanyaeger.api.Timer
com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities.EntitySpawner
public abstract class EntitySpawner extends Timer
An EntitySpawner is the abstract superclass that should be extended to create an object that spawns a subclass of YaegerEntity. After each interval in ms, set through the constructor, the method spawnEntities() is called, which should be implemented in a subclass.

To add an EntitySpawner the YaegerScene should implement the interface EntitySpawnerContainer, after which the method EntitySpawnerContainer.setupEntitySpawners() should be implemented to add the newly created Entity Spawners through the method EntitySpawnerContainer.addEntitySpawner(EntitySpawner).

    • spawnEntities

      protected abstract void spawnEntities()
      This method is called after each interval in milliseconds as passed through the constructor of this EntitySpawner. It's body should be used for calling spawn(YaegerEntity) with the required instance of YaegerEntity.

    • spawn

      protected void spawn(YaegerEntity entity)
      Spawn an YaegerEntity. Use this method to add the spawned YaegerEntity to the YaegerScene.
      Parameters:
      entity - The YaegerEntity to be spawned.

    • getSupplier

      public EntitySupplier getSupplier()
      Return the EntitySupplier that is part of this EntitySpawner.

      Note: This method is part of the internal API, and should not be used when implementing a Yaeger game.

      Returns:
      The EntitySupplier that is part of this EntitySpawner.

    • setSupplier

      @Inject public void setSupplier(EntitySupplier supplier)
